did.unittitle: Charles Salk (Salkowitz) FBI Files and Correspondence
did.abstract: Charles Salk (Salkowitz) was an officer on the New York City Metro Area Postal Workers Union (APWU). This collection contains FBI files on Salk and his correspondence with the FBI and U.S. Representative Lester Wolff concerning those records.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged alphabetically by topic.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: No original order was apparent. Materials were grouped by topic and placed in archival folders. Folder titles have been supplied by the archivist.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains FBI files on Salk, obtained through the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) and his correspondence with the FBI and U.S. Representative Lester Wolff concerning those records.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Charles Salk (Salkowitz) was an officer on the New York City Metro Area Postal Workers Union (APWU).
